definition: beyond the Great Wall
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
strategic pass/tactical border position
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
outside/in addition/foreign/external

sentences.english: Cotton is one of the Chaoyang specialty known as "Beyond the Great Yin-hua, " said.
sentences.chinese: 棉花是朝阳的特产之一，素有“塞外银花”之称。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was an old man who lived with his son on the borders of the country.
sentences.chinese: 从前，一位老翁和他的儿子住在塞外的边境上。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to consider the status of the Northern Dynasties continuation of Chaoyang city beyond the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 研究北朝时期朝阳塞外重镇地位的延续。

sentences.english: All the better. It will be honed by the sandstorms of the northern deserts.
sentences.chinese: 正好，塞外的风沙能磨砺出他的坚强。

definition: Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
desert
frontier fortress

ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times/foreigner/barbarian
Youzhou, ancient province in north Hebei and Liaoning/Fanyang 範陽|范阳 ancient city near modern Beijing
Yin mountains in Inner Mongolia
Inner Mongolia (lit. south of the Gobi Desert)
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei

Western Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (400-421)
